Articles.Content:
Ladies, and Kerbalmens,

i present you today, 

THE DROPSHIP 45!

Its very big, i know. But it flies and it works! Take a look at these Pictures:

Random Takeoff:

![8Rq22.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8Rq22.jpg)

Eject the little Ship:

![pMX0G.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pMX0G.jpg)

Whoo! The big ship flies away! 

![hFxXn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hFxXn.jpg)

Lets fly the little thing:

![sqBaY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sqBaY.jpg)

We need some parachutes! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

![Uyw1D.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Uyw1D.jpg)

Crash! Oh no. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

![PzDJe.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PzDJe.jpg)

Optional Pictures:

> 
> Random Pictures:
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/VJbvv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VJbvv.jpg)
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/ONafW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ONafW.jpg)
> 
> 

Yes... Okay heres the download if you want it:

Have some fun with it! Bye.

Put the .craft data into the SPH file!

-TheDownloaderG3y

That was a nice plane! I really liked the redundancy and stability of it. Better than anything I have made so far.

It sure can take a beating, I took a turn too fast in the main plane and lost the right engine and a large chunk of wing, but I was able to regain control and launch the smaller plane.

Then another time when I lost control and was about to crash into the ocean, so I launched the smaller plane while the big one was exploding and jumping about. Its wings got sheared off and I lost several parachutes, but enough was left for me to splash down. 

All in all, very nice indeed!
